  • Changelog

    Prepare the projects data in FR and DE to be included in the app as .rds files

    prepare_app_data.Rd

    Prepare the projects data in FR and DE to be included in the app as .rds files

    prepare_app_data(
  name_raw_file = "PGV.xlsx",
  pkg_dir = system.file(package = "exploratorium"),
  dic_variables = NULL,
  dic_cantons = NULL,
  cantons_sf = NULL
)

    Arguments

    name_raw_file

    Character. Name of the raw data file.

    pkg_dir

    Character. Path to the package (must contain a data-raw folder).

    dic_variables

    Tibble. Variables dictionaries. Mainly used for examples and unit testing purpose.

    dic_cantons

    Tibble. Canton dictionary. Mainly used for examples and unit testing purpose.

    cantons_sf

    Sf data. Cantons geometry. Mainly used for examples and unit testing purpose.

    Value

    A list with the projects data in FR and DE.

    Examples

    # Load the toy datasets
data("toy_data_pgv")
data("toy_dic_variables")
data("toy_dic_cantons")
data("toy_cantons_sf")

# Create a temp folder with data-projects-raw and ata-projects subfolder
my_temp_dir <- tempfile("test-prepare-data")
dir.create(my_temp_dir)
dir.create(file.path(my_temp_dir, "data-projects-raw"))
dir.create(file.path(my_temp_dir, "data-projects"))

# Save the toy PGV file inside
writexl::write_xlsx(
  toy_data_pgv, 
  file.path(
    my_temp_dir, 
    "data-projects-raw", 
    "toy_PGV.xlsx"
  )
)

# Prepare the data
prepare_app_data(
  name_raw_file = "toy_PGV.xlsx",
  pkg_dir = my_temp_dir, 
  dic_variables = toy_dic_variables, 
  dic_cantons = toy_dic_cantons,
  cantons_sf = toy_cantons_sf
)

unlink(my_temp_dir, recursive = TRUE)
